name: Product analyst (India, Mumbai)
description:
Dostavista.global - one of the biggest and most technologically advanced players in the global same-day delivery market. We deliver unparalleled convenience to businesses and people, all the while creating millions of self-managed courier jobs. Our couriers, like modern taxi drivers, work via mobile apps on their own schedule.

You will be responsible for:
  • Help product team with data-research for understanding our clients & delivery partners;
  • Participate in creating experiments to get statistically significant results, cover experiments with reports, find the insights;
  • Calculate and monitor key product metrics, create and support dashboards. Set up alerts for automatical problems tracking;
  • Help global team with creating unified metrics and reports for main product, sales and operational processes;
  • Create ad hoc reports for Sales & Operations team.
What do we expect:
  • 3+ years of experience in the field of Data Analytics/Product Analytics;
  • Fluent with SQL and are able to write complex and performant queries with no assistance;
  • Ability to formalize and visualize the results of the data analysis;
  • Strong knowledge of conventional statistical techniques in data analysis;
  • Experience with Tableau or other BI systems;
  • Ability to work with Python (creating bots, dataset analysis) is highly appreciated;
  • Experience with experimentation and A/B testing methodology;
  • Experience with predictive modeling;
  • English - Upper-intermediate or higher level;
  • Mobility: relocation to India is required.
We offer:
  • Flexible schedule: we work at a convenient time, the main thing is to be in touch during the main working hours;
  • Horizontal structure without strict subordination and bureaucracy;
  • The annual indexation of salaries and the feedback from the head;
  • Education: own library, paid courses and conferences.
